raw_response: {"answer_index": 2, "answer_text": "Sporozoite protein", "confidence": 10, "reasoning": "The most widely used malaria vaccine (RTS,S/AS01) targets the circumsporozoite protein (CSP) found on the surface of the Plasmodium falciparum sporozoite.
